Articles.Content:
Hi everyone .

i going to introduce you my last Fun Craft ( or Fun Truck )

This is a Kethane Miner Truck with a dock able Tank .

Mods used : Kethane , Engineer & KAS .

1 Jumbo64 (0/2880_0/3520)

2 ROUND-8 Toroidal (0/20_0/24.4)

2 Stratus-V (0/300)

1 KE-TL10 (0/2000)

2 PB-X50R (0/800)

2 Kerbals can seat in the truck , inboard view is usable .

1 EAS-1 External Command Seat .

Build with one small drill and the medium converter .

329 parts & 24.37 t , all tanks are empty . You must find kethane

Link : https://www.dropbox.com/s/o3efekq7fg0f98k/20%20Wheelers.craft

I trying to make a nicer truck , this is not really beautiful . But it do the job .

Finally i installed some mods !
